snippet.title: World of Final Fantasy - Welcome to Grymoire!
snippet.description:
Explore the beautiful and dark land of Grymoire in this new trailer for World of Final Fantasy, coming to PlayStation 4 and PlayStation Vita on October 28th 2016 in Europe and October 25th 2016 in North America.

Lead the twins Lann and Reynn on their journey to rediscover their lost memories and save the world of Grymoire from peril as they band together with familiar faces from the Final Fantasy franchise in an epic and adorable adventure for a new generation of players! 

Follow us for more updates on World of Final Fantasy:
Facebook – https://www.facebook.com/FinalFantasy 
Twitter – https://www.twitter.com/FinalFantasy
